Package nl.han.ica.yaeger.engine.scenes.impl

Class DynamicScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.yaeger.engine.scenes.impl.StaticScene
      • nl.han.ica.yaeger.engine.scenes.impl.DynamicScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clearable, Configurable, Destroyable, Initializable, YaegerScene, KeyListener
    public abstract class DynamicScene
extends StaticScene
    Instantiate a new DynamicScene. A DynamicScene extends a StaticScene, but adds its own Gameloop.
